title: Why does every post on this board have multiple downvotes?

replies.body:
I think people usually downvote threads that have no real reading value or are too bias/inconsiderate of other possibilities or choices.

If you say dota2 is better than LoL and LoL is watered down trash of it, expect downvotes.  It isn't about people defending LoL with downvotes, it's about the lack of thought and the shallow mindedness that went into the post.  You can like and play both games -- one game is not better than the other for everyone.

Goes for skins, champions, games, memes, balance changes. etc.

Without saying names, a particular user comes on the board occasionally who has multiple accounts and down votes everything. He doesn't come on that often, but when he does he comes on to stir trouble. Just ignore it and in a day or so post your idea again.
than you might seem a little desperate if u re-post often lol
Nah. Just wait till next weekend or something, people will forget. Or even just a few days. Just don't spam it.
ya spamming not the best option :) or simply delete the last one (copy n paste) get the point across or something
Ooooh, say name pls

Sorry man, I'm not starting a witch hunt. I've reported the person to Riot and it seems he's been banned from the forums for the time being, giving that some of his comments have been removed and a particular thread that he made being taken down. That said, just because a user has been banned, it doesn't actually stop them from upvoting/downvoting. It just prevents them commenting. So **shrugs** haha.

Everything said and done, it actually **isn't** anyone in this thread. Despite all of the argument that's happening below, it had nothing to do with either of them. A certain user accused me of being the person downvoting everything (which I'm not but eh that's a dead horse), I explained why I wasn't, then he accused someone else of being me. Fun. Times haha.

Can't upvote/downvote. I got a 1 day ban for, and I quote from my notification on it, 

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
I love your posts mate! They always brighten up my day with a good laugh! Keep it coming :)

You mean like when you said you were done making posts? (He said he was done making posts and then made about 40)"

(I'm not sure how this is bannable? I've said much worse than this without anything happening lol...but that's besides the point)

Point being that I was unable to upvote/downvote. That being said, however, if he has a million smurfs like you say, that's why he would still be able to do it.

Ah sorry you're right, you can't upvote/downvote. My bad.

It wasn't a million smurfs. It was about 3 accounts total from what I could guess. The thread I was on was just standard, everyone had 1 or 2 points, then suddenly everyone was on -1 or -2 and his were all 3 and bragging about a subject.

There one nasty person, who level multiple accounts only for downvoting. He pretends to be a nice guy to others, but in reality, he downvotes everyone and everything, while giving himself multiple upvotes. Also, moderators are on this person's side, because he have multiple accounts and can report you multiple times, so no one is allowed to name this person or do anything about him. But let me tell you this - he already commented on this thread and expects people not to notice, that he upvotes himself.

The only nasty person I've ever actually noticed on these boards is you, Regonas. You called me an alt account a ways back, but I'm just some dude who likes posting concepts and discussing game design and was surprised anyone actually cares enough to troll and flame on these boards for such a long time.

> [{quoted}](name=Traxicus,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bdYW0yfn,comment-id=00060002,timestamp=2016-04-25T16:17:12.953+0000)

So, if i won't talk with main, you will use alt? That is low....

This is the only account I have. I see you've complained to a rioter about your concept that got 8 downvotes. You've constructed some sort of fantasy that multiple people couldn't possibly hate you for all the terrible ways you treat people on these boards. You can continue to delude yourself that it's one asshole pulling strings around you, or you can accept that it's you who's wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=Traxicus,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bdYW0yfn,comment-id=0006000200000000,timestamp=2016-04-25T17:26:50.766+0000)

What ways? You are the one in delusions. I have been nothing but nice to people on this board, review concepts of other people if they ask, give suggestion if they want, help out.
And while we are talking about assholes, i was tracking my last concept, checking on it ever minute or so, and at about 15:35 (+2 time zone), it got 8 downvotes in less than a minute. So, either i am right, like always, and this is doing of one single guy, or these haters have some serious coordination. 8 downvotes in less than a minute, how can you coordinate people like that?

You can continue to lie, make false claims, continue to downvote me. Mentally healthy people will check for themselves, found out who is lying and, i hope, will make you taste your own medicine.

I'll concede it's strange you got 8 downvotes in less than a minute. I was only one of them, but I've rescinded it because I realized it was childish to do so.

I'm not going to dig up how awful you were acting a few months ago when we last conversed, because I like to do my part in keeping the boards positive. If you want, we can start over. I'll give thorough feedback to a concept of yours if you'll do it for mine. I was proud of this one, but it got ignored. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/guA2gqzg-champ-concept-camber-a-mage-with-crits

I'm an architecture major, and a big part of our academics is giving thoughtful critique. Do you have a concept you'd like me to look at?

At the moment, i am a little too busy, but i can look it up later.

I've seen worse 15 downvotes in a minute on a concept that was pretty good but still needed little work.

Also you tend to post a lot of concepts. I mean I have 5 champion concepts in 4 years of posting. I lost count of how many champion concepts you have.

Probably doing of the same person. And no one is allowed to names this person, because moderators bans for that.

Yes, i am creative, i post many concepts, but to tell you the truth, i have to hold myself back. I could pop a concept every hour for days, but i don't do that, so other people could have better chance to be seen and get some attention. I post now only my best one, but believe me, i could post concepts faster than you could read them.

Or maybe -shock- it's because people don't like them as they aren't very good? Quality over quantity. That's a thing. There isn't any grand downvote conspiracy despite your best efforts to convince yourself because I doubt anyone gives enough of a fk to waste time on trivial shit like this. 

Also humility. You need some.

But hey at least you got the exaggeration and lying down. You should become a politician!

If you think I have 20 smurfs just waiting in the wings, good for you. 

But if you really want to know, note how people comment about y'know, how they like it. Because I put effort into mine. Actual effort. That's why I put out 1 a month, not 3 an hour.

> [{quoted}](name=Vorazun,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bdYW0yfn,comment-id=000600020000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-25T22:04:05.458+0000)

Strawman. No matter how much time you spend, if you upvote yourself and get a lot of attention, then you concept will get even more attention.
But go on, deny your self-upvoting and downvoting of others. I am not the only one who notices it. Sooner or later, karma will do its thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Vorazun,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bdYW0yfn,comment-id=00060002000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-26T05:26:58.835+0000)
>
> Except that your argument has a critical flaw that exonerates me: that upvotes generate views, and in turn reviews of one's concept. As someone who only posts a concept quite sparsely, there is no reason as to why I would routinely downvote the entire board. If I'm channeling reviews, where are they gonna go? Thin air? 

Don't know why you do it. Don't really care. Maybe you are raised to be like that, maybe you have some health problems. I don't know and it doesn't matter. Seen you do it, sooner or later, other will see it too. Just matter of time.
 
> Consequently, it makes you, someone who posts very frequently, have the best chance of being the person who downvoted the entire board, as you want reviews for your concept, no? That's motive. 

So, you are saying i downvote myself, to get views? Yeah, i am not sure if strawman or sarcasm. Even more suspicious, is you saying that. Because, if you post rarely and get many upvotes, people will asume your concepts are good and worth viewing. Too bad, that those upvotes is self-done.

> Secondary motive is that you have caused most of the board to hate you, which, given your behavior isn't surprising, since you would want to inflict negative consequence unto them. That's motive 2. 

Most of board? Know 3 summoners, who might be and probably is one single guy. Now, you saying that, adds the suspicion. You try to prove, that i am extremely hated guy here, when 90% comments i receive on my concepts are positive. Funny, how you claim that everyone hates me, but it is only you and your alts, who hates me. That is motive number 3, by the way.

> As to means and opportunity, well anyone can create accounts, and it's not like these boards are hard to get to. 

Now you are excusing your downvoting alts. Not a smart move, if you want to pretend to be innocent.
 
> You night want everyone in an uproar trying to uproot your enemies, but the obvious as fk way you're doing it fools no one. 

I got called out for bad grammar several times, but damn. You look as you say about others.
 
> That's why either A. Your logic is flawed, or B. You're dumb enough to paint a trail leading to yourself. 

And we reached conclusion: A. either you change your summoner name once again, because people once again figure out about your nasty behavior, darkfoxes, or B. you will jump to one of your alts and start all over again.

> In which case this paints you as the worst D-list movie villain ever.

And how it pains you, my dear hater? D-list evil genius, who reveals his plans at first chance he gets?
Sorry, i will stop feeding the troll, because you are just getting more comments to downvote. People aren't that stupid, they will figure you out. And they will not be happy about your actions.
Bye bye.

I honestly don't understand why Regonas is targeting anyone. If anyone is doing what he says. (Always possible.) I doubt they would engage with him on the subject.  If they do, however, that doesn't prove they didn't do such a thing--in fact, there is no real way to prove it for or against. While I think I've seen it, I didn't call the guy out. A few days later, enough people had seen the comments and brought all the comments towards a common zero. At which point, where's the evidence anyway? 

Honestly, this is really a pointless, and rather bitter argument. Regonas is evidently hurt by whatever happened to his post/s, but he also accuses you of being another person. Which is nigh impossible to prove. This entire argument is a 'take my word for it' mess, and as such cannot be easily resolved.

I've said my piece, good day. (*Please* have a good day. This mess has gone beyond ridiculous.)

~CrimsonCobra3

Except that your argument has a critical flaw that exonerates me: that upvotes generate views, and in turn reviews of one's concept. You night want everyone in an uproar trying to uproot your enemies, but the obvious as fk way you're doing it fools no one.

It looked like the other person had ~3 alternate accounts or 3 dedicated friends. 8 is ridiculous, and I know Riot tries to manage that. I've also watched the pattern of downvotes on the boards and seen that at certain periods the boards just get a stupid amount of downvotes on *every* post, and then it is reverted a little while later. I don't know if this is simply a strange pattern that occurs normally, or if people purposely downvote everything, but it is noticeable.

Same thing, but in opposite spectrum, is with Vorazun. While i accidentally saw it, but he posted a concept and in 2 minutes he got 6 upvotes.

Call me crazy, but this feel connected. 8 downvotes out of nowhere in 1 minute, 6 upvoted in nearly same amount of time, also from nowhere. Maybe it is me, maybe i am the crazy one. Maybe they are chinese, because in china's army they have very good coordination and follow commands perfectly.

Anyway, it's nice how you throw in a touch of racism. Scraping the bottom of the barrel I see. Maybe when you come back with a proper argument. Karma can't do much to me because A. I haven't done anything wrong, and B. I bought tons of MR and a BV :).

As someone who took these boards VERY seriously for about half a year straight, I can say with near-certainty that there are a handful of troublemakers around.  They will systematically downvote every single thread on the front page one by one, then log into another account and do it all over again.

I watched the boards like a hawk several months ago, and noticed a pattern.  It always happened around the same time of day, too.

Just look at this two pictures and their time frames. Ceratain person come online and downvote wave hit this board.
http://i64.tinypic.com/23j0b3p.png
http://i65.tinypic.com/2hzn577.png
Now, i had to hide the name of this certain someone, because people are not allowed to name this certain someone or their comments will be removed.
Been wondering it too. It's like someone goes through and downvotes all of them without reading just so that meaningful posts wont get popular.
Board haters.

**H**aving
**A**nger
**T**owards
**E**veryone
**R**eaching
**S**uccess
But seriously though downvoting is an issue when you have positive feedback and  negative upvotes

Why does most of my games have someone that goes 0-10?

Because League players aren't very smart.

I'd understand some downvotes, if the user in question feels like the post isn't valuable or disagrees with the content.

Votes are only a representation of overall opinion (sans multiple-account abuse and whatnot), when the real value lies in the discussions to be had. Nobody is a pro designer on their first post, and may be subject to criticism.

I hate to say it, but you don't only have to downvote trolls and overall jerks. It's your opinion.
it maybe your opinion but when you have a downvote of like 5 or 12 with no comments you could understand a little explanation would be useful
Fair enough, although you can't expect everyone to be an effective critic. But at least a couple would be nice.
Doesnt need to be an effective critic :) just need high respect n be honest bout what you liked or didnt like about it
Because people prefer if they dont like what the person talks about they down vote it without a word. Which is really annoying.

IDK, but it fucks with Riot. Riot is only gonna look at posts with high numbers of upvotes b/c they don't want to waste their time with a potential new champion that only had a few supporters. Whoever this guy is, he obviously is just trolling.

Speaking of which, I literally posted a thread in concepts "Why are other champ concepts so popular?" 10 minutes ago, already has 1 downvote, which means someone looked at the title and assumed I was a whining bitch before even reading the post, since people who actually read posts comment on them. I will be tracking how many downvotes I get over the next day now that I posted this comment.

Yeah I don't even take it seriously anymore because you can get 10 downvotes for no reason. Just mentioning the word downvote or vote will get you 10. It really doesn't make sense you can downvote/upvote the thread from the forum category without even opening it. Makes it easier for trolls and makes the upvote/downvotes even more meaningless.

Yeah I have noticed at times there is clearly someone behind it. You can see someone who's being negative and completely nonconstructive in their posts, you disagree with them, and suddenly all of your posts and any posts disagreeing with them has 8+ downvotes. I actually see a few people I suspect of doing it in here.

It's also pretty obvious when the topic itself, and all replies are pretty positive, except 1 or 2 negative people that everyone disagrees with and downvotes, then suddenly all the positive replies with upvotes are now down to 0 or lower in a matter of minutes.

Recently it happened in the 'Ask a Sona Main' thread, there were tons of replies that were not negative in any way, not bad posts, with positive upvotes. Then I look today and almost all of those posts that were positive now have -3 or worse... I don't buy it.
Pretty much spot on.  You just have really spiteful people around who downvote without reading etc.

I don't understand why there is an option to upvote/downvote just by viewing the forum category without evening opening the topic.. makes it even easier for someone to go through and downvote a bunch without even reading
